question: DRDO’s Integrated weapons system design centre has been inaugurated in which city?
explanation:
The DRDO’s Integrated weapons system design centre has been inaugurated by the Vice President M Venkaiah Naidu at Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Missile Complex – Hyderabad.
This centre would set an all-new platform for enhanced design - development for surface to air missile (SAM) systems and ballistic missile defence (BMD) systems.
